title: Software Engineer
summary: I work on SpringBoot-based microservices that grant access to JFrog Artifactory Services. My responsibilities include enhancing application resilience through the implementation of monitoring and metrics. I also conduct Splunk analysis to monitor and optimize service performance.

title: Software Engineer
summary: I led the creation of a Java SpringBoot micro-service ticketing system catering to diverse product delivery teams. I successfully introduced a Kafka event-driven architecture. Notably, I optimized Cassandra record cleanup by over 100% for a substantial dataset using multi-threading techniques. My proficiency in the Elasticsearch Java Client facilitated the execution of intricate nested aggregation queries. Furthermore, I efficiently managed docker container lifecycles through Kubernetes.
